ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 79
ygData.msgSnippet: AND, if this was a slip up or whatnot, clean it up and stay on the list. I m all for people growing and developing. But, if this is how you actually feel (your
ygData.messageBody:
AND, if this was a slip up or whatnot, clean it up and stay on the list. I'm
all for people growing and developing. But, if this is how you actually feel
(your comment to Rebecca), then I would rather you not be on the list. I
really don't know what Rebecca said or did, but that's not the issue here. I
do NOT care to come back from a weekend, to sift through 120 emails to find
stuff like this. Not that it was hard or upsetting, was real easy to delete,
but it can offend some people, and it's just plain disrespectful.

Clean it up, I'd welcome you to stay and participate.

-David Whitcraft, Leod on Fennin Ro, Sterling Order of Knights

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean.Clark@... [mailto:Sean.Clark@...]
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 4:15 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com; brutalny@...
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Digest Number 79


From: Sean.Clark@...

Hi Nick
As you have probably already realized, your original comments are completely
inappropriate for the list. Furthermore, I want you to know that I find you
second comment (below), addressed to Rebecca to be completely inappropriate,
childish and unprofessional.
Without getting into your complete lack of respect for other individuals,
your disregard for appropriate way to address a lady, and your lack of
intellectual ingenuity in dealing with criticism, (not to mention your
apparent lack of maturity), I would like to suggest that you take your crude
language AND your lame attitude and remove yourself from this list.
This is NOT a forum for EQ complaints, and I certainly don't recall any
posts asking for your opinion on anything, much less you opinion on camping.
Grow up.
Get a job.
Learn to express yourself in a manner appropriate to your environment.
Sean

To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 79


From: "Nick" <brutalny@...>

Since you think this is not a bitch list rebecca maybe you should leave
bitch
